text: geudeul-eun hananim oeui daleun geos-eul sungbaehanani igeosdeul-eun haechi jido moshago geudeul-ege doumdo ju ji moshanila ideul-i hananim ap-e seo malhagil ideul-eun uliui jungjaeja deul-ila illeogalodoe neohuineun cheonjieissneun geos jung geubun-i alji moshaneun geos-i issneunji hananimkke malhal su issneunyo geubun-eul chingsonghala geubun-eun geu deul-i sungbaehaneun geos wie gyesinila
